lines.text: create integer vector array v of size k
create long longs cnt , mx with cnt = 0 , mx = 0

lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < k ; i ++ )

lines.text: create integers x , h , kk , with h = 1 , kk = - 1

lines.code: for ( int j = 0 ; j < x ; j ++ )

lines.text: if size of v [ i ] is not 0 and v [ i ] [ 0 ] is 1 and y is h + 1
add element y to end of v [ i ]
for i = 0 to k exclusive , increment mx by size of v [ i ] - 1

lines.text: print long long casted ( mx + cnt - 1 ) print newline
